```{r}
source("shared_code/data_cleaning.R")
```


```{r}
head(raw)

eda_dat <-
  raw %>%
  mutate(
    day = day(time),
    year = season,
    time = hour(time)
  )

# select first hurricane

hur_1 <- 
  eda_dat %>%
  group_by(id) %>%
  mutate(
    hur_id = cur_group_id()
  ) %>%
  filter(hur_id %in% c(4, 6))
```


```{r}
hur_1 %>% head()
library(plotly)
hur_1 %>% 
  plot_ly(
    lat = ~latitude, 
    lon = ~longitude, 
    type = "scattermapbox", 
    mode = "line", 
    alpha = 1,
    color = ~id) %>% 
  layout(
    mapbox = list(
      style = 'carto-positron',
      center = list(lon = -65, lat = 30)))
```
